name: Realistic 3D Pacman
description:
Pacman SUPER REALISTIC version

This is the conversion of the traditional Pacman to a First Person "horror" game. You have to survive fleeing from ghosts and collect 15 letter fragments.

Use the GPS to locate yourself and the nearby ghosts. When you have active the GPS, the battery is getting low, collect batteries from the floor to get to the 100%.

Pick up guns from the floor (Randomly spawn around the map) to kill ghosts, be aware of the bullets quantity.

There are 4 types of ghosts: Red, blue, green and pink.
  • Red Ghost: Is the slowest, but is following you ALWAYS.
  • Blue and green ghost: Is the fastest and is randomly moving around the map, but if you are so close, they will follow you until you get out of their vision range.
  • Pink ghost: Always place his moving target close to you.
>> DISCORD << This game was made for fun in a week or less, report bugs or something else in the comment section.
